data: courtyard of a small hotel in the Rue Barbet-de-Jouy
eleven o’clock | evening in the month of May

“Near eleven o’clock, one evening in the month of May, a man about fifty years of age, well formed, and of noble carriage, stepped from a coupe in the courtyard of a small hotel in the Rue Barbet-de-Jouy.”
